approved_Office_Software.title: Microsoft Word
approved_Office_Software.description: Microsoft Word is a word processor developed by Microsoft. It was first released on October 25, 1983 under the name Multi-Tool Word for Xenix systems.

approved_Office_Software.title: Kubernetes
approved_Office_Software.description: Kubernetes is an open-source container-orchestration system for automating application deployment, scaling, and management. It is now maintained by the Cloud Native Computing Foundation.
